abstract: A new Boeing 787 Dreamliner flown by United Airlines was diverted in midflight to New Orleans after it lost speed and altitude over Mississippi with 184 people aboard.
snippet: A new Boeing 787 Dreamliner flown by United Airlines was diverted in midflight to New Orleans after it lost speed and altitude over Mississippi with 184 people aboard.
lead_paragraph: A new Boeing 787 Dreamliner flown by United Airlines was diverted in midflight to New Orleans on Tuesday because of concern about a possible mechanical problem.

headline.main: United 787 Loses Speed and Lands Early
headline.print_headline: United 787 Loses Speed and Lands Early

byline.original: By Christopher Drew and Jad Mouawad
